description:
This catalog contains the 'Planetary Surface Portal' (PSuP) hosted planetary data.
PSuP is a data processing center coupled with a data dissemination center for planetary surfaces. The PSuP portal is an initiative of OSUPS and OSUL. PSuP provides : 
- Service platforms for processing and visualizing planetary surface data.
- Products derived from local and global maps (mineralogical information, geomorphological information, DTM, ...).
- Mining tools, 2D/3D visualization (MarsVisu), DTM processing (MarsSI).
- Query/data transfer tools.
National Observation Service (SNO) labelled. This catalog is organized by french scientific laboratory. Within each sub-catalog, users will find data organized by solar body.

links.title: Pôle de données et services Surfaces Planétaires

title: PSuP, Planetary Surface Portal
